alert.note: Alert for Lower St. Martin; Lower St. Mary; Upper St. Mary (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 7:28AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of St. Mary and south central St. Martin Parishes through 800 AM CDT... At 727 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Burns Point, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Morgan City, Franklin, Patterson, Berwick, Burns Point, Bayou Vista, Ellerslie, Amelia, Patterson Memorial Airport and Centerville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lower St. Martin; Lower St. Mary; Upper St. Mary
